# Plugin

## Pronunciation

- /ˈplʌɡɪn/

## Meanings

### Noun

Anything that plugs into something.

---

A module or device that interacts with another to add a specific feature or function.

---

An electric vehicle that can be recharged from an external power source.

PEV
